fields.name: Pay Up (Passive):
fields.value: If you send Otis (creator of this role) $5.00 USD via PayPal or Venmo, you can alter any of the game rules as you please, including letting yourself win instantly.

fields.name: Host's Cut (Passive):
fields.value: At host discretion, you may be required to instead send $4.00 USD to Otis (creator of this role) and $1.00 USD to the host in order to trigger Pay Up.
